page.title: 18SECTION l0 + SECTION ll
page.content:
AMENITIES - 38 = 2 boat parks west side of lake with access from main road A.592. They are situated side by side with moorings for approx. 80 boats on each side. There are 7 landing stages. Mooring all year round 48 = l hotel. 67 = Post Bus from Penrith to Martindale twice daily. Private Mini bus is used for children to link up with school bus at Pooley Bridge.
SECTION ll - EAST OF ULLSWATER ECOLOGY - Footpath connecting lake road with common land EMPLOYMENT - Farming and tourism. LAND COVER - 0l = 2 farms each with small caravan & camping sites. 2 chalets occupied all year. l2 = enclosed rough grazing. l4 = Barton Park, deciduous trees, mainly oak. l9 = part of Lake Ullswater
